text: Idk how much longer I can keep living aloneNothing has changed for me as a result of the quarantine   I don t have anyone to see or anywhere to go anyway   I work a part time job I hate and suck at   was supposed to graduate college  but that s not happening for a while now  and to be honest I don t really care   Never had a girlfriend  not a real relationship at least   Still a virgin at    Don t ask girls out much  but I recently started to   Both were taken  as it seems everyone is  Everyone s got somebody  but not me  The past week I reconnected with an internet friend of mine who I used to be close with   We ve been talking all day and sexting at night   Out of nowhere she said she wants to stop the sexual stuff because she s afraid she ll become addicted to it and it s unhealthy when it s with someone you ll never meet   I get it and honestly agree   She s very serious about relationships and all that   I m not upset about that   Our conversations just don t seem as fun or frequent anymore and that s what s  upsetting me just a day later   It s like we re forcing the affection to not be there because we know it ll never matter   It s stupid to get upset over someone I don t even know   But it s so rare for me to connect with anyone   She came along and it just feels nice to have someone to talk to    I m tired of being lonely every fucking minute of my life   I haven t felt physical and mutual affection in close to five years now  unless you count sexting with someone across the damn world   It hasn t gotten easier and I don t think it ever will   I had every opportunity to make friends and find a girlfriend in college   I failed at that   How am I gonna find anyone when the easiest days are behind me   The loneliness is fucking tearing me apart

text: Why Should I Live for Others I do love the people in my life  But ultimately if I choose to go  the consequences and the pain I cause  If I even cause pain  won t matter  Future opportunities won t matter  What I ll miss out on doesn t matter  All it means is that I won t have to drag on  I won t have to struggle through the crippling pain  the PTSD episodes  the DID  the insomnia  the existential pain that I use drugs and alcohol to get through   It s not like I m not trying though  I go to therapy  I want to get better  I m taking my meds  I m trying so hard to find reasons to stay but every second that passes I m losing my will   Why should I not indulge in vices and let them kill me  At least I d go out on a high I ve called hotlines  and I ve been hospitalized  All it does is really just postpone the decision  Throw me in a hospital and restrain me  What then What if some people can t get better   What if some people can t function If I m going to be in so much pain and fear and paranoia  despite years of taking meds and actively trying to get better  what is the fucking point   Why should I suffer so others don t have to If I isolate myself enough  If I distance myself enough eventually I won t be a part of anyone s life so why should I stay   The things  I ll miss out on  don t matter  What matters is now  And now is unbearable   If  I m living for others then does that mean my needs and my struggle matter less than what could actually be the right path for me I don t know  I don t want anyone to kill themselves  I m tired and confused  I m so exhausted  I ve pushed myself to be sober  I ve pushed myself to go back to school  I ve forced myself to find reasons to live  I m trying to take it minute bu minute  But nothing is getting better   Please someone  Tell me why I should stay
summary: If I choose to live for others, the consequences and the pain I cause won't matter. The things I'll miss out on don't matter, what matters is now. I use drugs and alcohol to get through the existential pain, PTSD episodes, DID, insomnia and paranoia. I'm tired and confused, I'm trying to be sober and go back to school.
cleaned: choose live consequence pain not matter thing miss not matter matter use drug alcohol existential pain pt episode insomnia paranoia tired confused try sober school
